skip.description: If true, the statistics creation will be skipped

minOccurencesForMethodsBeforeSumarizatio.description: The minimum amount of occurences for methods to be visible in the Methods before summarization table. If its one, all methods are shown (not recommended)

projectGroupingThreshold.description: All projects which's value is below this value will be grouped as a 'other projects' value. This does only affect the 'Origins of methods used in the final dataset' pie chart.
